Template¶

class src.template.Template(name, residues)[source]¶
class Template¶

This class groups informations about a template sequence/structure.

name¶

str – Name of the template

residues¶

list of Residue object – Template’s sequence of residues as list of Residues objects

benchmark¶

int – Fold family type of the template: 3: Family, 2: Superfamily, 1: Fold and 0: None It tells how similar the template is from the query structure. This is necessary to be able to benchmark the new scoring functions.

pdb¶

str – PDB filename of the template

display()[source]¶

This function prints the residues as a sequence

Returns:Amino acid sequence.
Return type:str
parse_pdb(pdb_path)[source]¶

Parse the pdb file and set the CA coordinates.

Parameters:pdb_path – Path to the directory containing .atm file of the actual template.
reindex_pdb(start_index, pdb_path, clean=True)[source]¶

Original code from: https://zhanglab.ccmb.med.umich.edu/reindex_pdb/reindex_pdb.py

  • Parse PDB file
  • Reindex it according to start index
  • Write the new reindexed PDB
Parameters:
  • start_index (int) – Index of first residue
  • pdb_path (str) – Path to the directory containing the PDB to reindex
reindex_pdb_by_index(start_index=1, pdb_txt='')[source]¶

Original code from: https://zhanglab.ccmb.med.umich.edu/reindex_pdb/reindex_pdb.py Reindex residue number of PDB format text

Parameters:
  • start_index (int) – Index of first residue
  • pdb_txt (str) – Text of input PDB to be reindexed
Returns:

Text of the reindexed PDB
Return type:

str
set_benchmark(fold_type)[source]¶

Sets the benchmark attribute of the template.

Parameters:fold_type (int) – 3: Family, 2: Superfamily, 1: Fold and 0: None
set_pdb_name(metafold_dict)[source]¶

Set the pdb file name of the template from the template’s name.

Parameters:metafold_dict – A dictionary with key = template name and value = pdb file
